entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linker doesn't substitute feature switches when used with 'copy' #95429
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] CultureInfo.DisplayName only shows abbreviation #95427
    9.0.0
  • libcoreclr signal handler may cause stack overflow SIGSEGV on 3rd party library threads #95419
  • ExecutionEngineException on using step into while debugging #95417
  • [HTTP3] [outerloop] Requesting HTTP version 3.0 with version policy RequestVersionExact while unable to establish HTTP/3 connection #95413
    9.0.0
  • [mono] MAUI release mode crash Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:5220, condition `plt_entry' not met #95406
    8.0.x
  • [mono] Regression of BigInteger.Multiply on arm64 AOT-llvm #95403
  • [browser][nodejs] Start app with debugging for console template #95401
    9.0.0
  • ValidateOnStart API doesn't allow dependency loading when using IValidatableObject instead of IValidateOptions<IdentityServerOverridesOptions> #95400
  • Method changes behaviour after optimisation #95394
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Exception handling failures with filters #95393
    9.0.0
  • Add IsCompleted flag to System.Data.Common.DbTransaction #95399
  • SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature with #xpointer(/) reference #95390
  • JIT: Widespread jitstress failures with "Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()'" #95388
    9.0.0

Closed

  • DateTime.Parse("30.02.2023") throws System.FormatException: String '' was not recognized as a valid DateTime. #95428
  • GeneratedRegex source file RegexGenerator.g.cs not found by debugger #95293
  • [8.0] [wasm] Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.MaxMagnitude(tensorLength: 53) #93620
    8.0.x
  • [wasm] Unhandled `System.PlatformNotSupportedException` for crypto tests #94820
  • [outerloop] [NativeAOT] Segmentation fault in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests #95414
  • SIGSEGV in System.Numerics.Vectors #94856
    9.0.0
  • Strange 'BinarySearch' behavior with some special unicode characters #95363
  • Enabling InvariantGlobalization breaks int.Parse in WASI apps #94407
    9.0.0
  • Use the `-S` and `-B` Options on the CMake Command Line to Specify Source and Build Directories Instead of Moving with `pushd` #93702
    9.0.0
  • wasmbrowser template has wrong inspecturi #95391
    8.0.x
  • .NET 9, Android: AOT compiler currently fails with an assertion #94880
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] The type initializer for 'NetSecurityNative' threw an exception #93104
    9.0.0
  • Things needing System.Net.Security.Native may not work on Bionic #87665
    9.0.0
  • A published blazor wasm app throws a serialization error "Unhandled exception rendering component: ConstructorContainsNullParameterNames" #95409
  • Remove tools-local folder from repo root #36519
    Future
  • Documentation - Cross-Platform-Cryptography Update OAEP SHA-2 Padding Support Matrix #28018
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.UseAfterDispose(importKey: False) #85260
    Future
  • Could not use CreateFromEncryptedPemFile to load certificates when using dotnet 7 in FIPS environment. #94800
    Future
  • [outerloop] [NativeAOT] Code generation failed for method System.Linq.Tests.EmptyPartitionTests.SingleInstance() #95367
  • System.Text.Json, addition needed for JsonWriterOptions, to avoid URI serialization issue #95182
  • [API Proposal]: Quic connection keep alive #70090
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Additional QuicConnectionOptions #72984
    9.0.0
  • Improve Unix Console.ReadLine by borrowing from PowerShell's ReadLineFromConsole #94860
    Future
  • del #95375
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.JsonSerializerContext should support deserialization to private members. #95385
  • [NativeAOT] ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: tls_CurrentThread #93942
    Future
  • WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime [FAIL] #95378
  • Discrepancies in reported primitive type size #95366

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Simplify, and clean up target for bundled resource generation #95426
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • [workloads] Fix the condition for the workload metrics #95424
    area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 8.0 branch #95423
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [7.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 7.0 branch #95422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Remove _monoAotBuildshCommand and _monoAotCrossCompileArg from pipelines #95416
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete unused FindResourceDuplicates.ps1 script #95412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95410
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disabling mock test #95407
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.x
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AF_3A to IF_SVE_AQ_3A #95337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle platform not supported during test discovery. #94844
    area-System.Security
  • Revert "Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux" #95415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable EtwManifestGeneration tests on win-x86 #95389
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Bundle `runtimeconfig` in the single file bundle #95377
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reduce DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes on AddOptionsWithValidateOnStart #95135
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Fix _AssemblyInTargetingPack value during servicing #95278
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update README.md to add link to good first issues also #95374
    area-Meta
  • Split out a `TestContext` class from `RepoDirectoriesProvider` #95309
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid redundant GetVirtualMemoryLimit syscall #95376
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete some native AOT S.P.CoreLib compat suppressions #95380
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use managed ntlm on linux-bionic #95274
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix iOS/tvOS NativeAOT builds #95405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95359
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clear IconHandle when we fold compares #95383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Generalize check for full interruptibility #95299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add support for fcvt.w instructions to CodeGen::genIntToFloatCast #95327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest on WinSrv2022 #95339
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add regression testing for the STJv8 source generator. #95352
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Disable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows NativeAoT #95333
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixes for Bionic on x64 #95313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray AOT compatibility warning #95296
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] CI: trigger only WBT on template changes #95368
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade superpmi benchmarks to 9.0 #95372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Free the tls memory on thread termination #95362
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Clean up GT_NOP #95353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Test macOS runtime test crash dump collection #93989
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix FormatException message argument #95356
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make GetKeyedServices(KeyedService.AnyKey) return all services #95308
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Enable jump-to-next removal optimization for non-debug code #95340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (3/N) #95306
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95325
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Should we drop WasmImport and use DllImport #2414

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement WasmImportlinkage #2444

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not use funclets for faults #2443

Updated

  • [Async-2]: Tasklet aging #2425
    area-async
  • [Async-2] A few small tweaks on the managed side of state-machine based implementation. #2431
    area-async
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change name of Wasm Import function name to include the module prefix #2410

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet build` mangles invalid property specifications #37230
  • AOT compile gives incorrect error about Roslyn source generator coming from a ProjectReference #37228
  • Figure out how to keep the strict mode assembly version check running for some assemblies #37227
  • AssemblyIdentityMustMatch should emit different diagnostic ids for different cases #37225
  • Dotnet build does not set correct exit code when used with -graph parameter #37224
  • [Broken Build]: Dotnet Publish is not idempotent and deletes required Content #37222
  • SDK is incorrectly emitted SupportedOSPlatform("Windows7.0") #37220
  • Add-Migration not recognized after install of Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools #37205
  • lambda select bug #37202

Closed

  • [APICompat] CP0004 arguments are swapped #37199
  • Winget isn't listing .NET 8 for me #37201
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet tool run roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix install state file for MSI based installs #37223
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • don't use cookies to unblock CSRF workflows #37221
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Update AssemblyIdentityMustMatch.cs #37207
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • enforce behavior where ASPNETCORE_URLS overrides ASPNETCORE_HTTP(S)_PORTS #37219
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceLink
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2325867 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926
    Any Time
  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047
    Backlog
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Removing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler #71024
    17.9
  • Add some tests covering removing metadata references with MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges #71023
  • Add tests for MSBuildWorkspace on Windows containing options with quotes in them #71021
  • Switch the BuildHost to use System.Text.Json #71020
  • Correctly respect DOTNET_HOST_PATH in MSBuildWorkspace #71019
  • RemoteControlClient doesn't support BehaviorOnStale.ReturnStale on NetCore. #71014
  • IDE0028 and IDE0300 suggest using collection expressions inside expression trees #71012
  • CS8166 when returning a primary constructor parameter by ref #71011
  • SourceTextComparer has odd IEqualityComparer semantics #71006
  • Unable to use `nameof` in property: attribute in a record's primary constructor #71005
    17.9

Closed

  • false positive for CS8604 when using primary constructor and passing param `ILogger<>` to base ctor #70932
  • Type inference fails for lambda expression returning collection expression #69488
    17.9
  • Failing to build a C# class library project. Unhandled Exception: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null #70948
    17.9
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer #70909
    17.9
  • C# code with lambda in an array causes severl errors in refactoring code provider + diag analysis #71002
    17.9
  • StackOverflow when building a core-assembly. #60961
    17.9
  • Slice pattern with type pattern generates redundant type test (or fails to perform the test intended) #69053
    17.9
  • Feature flag to debug analyzer exceptions #70660
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify code and services for go-to-def, peek and ctrl-click across C#/VB/TS/F# #71018
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix building executables for language server #71007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Make sure completion don't trigger source generator #70985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: additional tests for output type inference #71017
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Mitigate RemoteControlClient not properly caching values on netcore. #71016
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix doc comment of a SyntaxToken #71015
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Skip flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle hoisted exception temps during closure rewriting #70997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid invalid cast exception in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer for top level statements with non-object base type. #71000
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return FunctionTypeSymbol from InferBestType helper. #71008
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Mark two more error codes as build-only #70999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add ExternalAccess.EditorConfigGenerator to visx manifest #71003
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use new lazily initialized value type in projectinfo #70993
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71025
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • added preproc for Core specific RCC download paths #70974
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid API docs missing #52466
  • Flaky test ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #52464
  • QuickGrid in Blazor Server .Net 8 Not available #52463
  • Flaky test BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #52462
  • StaticWebAssets.Publish.targets -The process cannot access the file o net8.0-android #52460
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52459
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #52458
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #52457
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #52456
  • Adding server side blazor breaks hot reloading of regular razor pages #52453
    Backlog
  • Stop aspnetcore application running in IIS #52451
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52448
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52447
  • [.NET 9.0] Native Trace Instrumentation Support for ASP.NET Core as per OTel specification #52439
  • `InvalidOperationException` occurs on `onsubmit` event when using `NavigateTo` method with non-ASCII characters on Blazor SSR render mode. #52438
  • General feedback on kestrel connection metrics #52437

Closed

  • [gRPC] How to correctly transmit error details to client with gRPC-JSON transcoding? #49196
  • IncludeHttpRuleProtos not working if not reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.JsonTranscoding directly #52006
  • Cannot deserialize into `google.protobuf.NullValue` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51521
  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://xxxxx.b2clogin.com/<TenantId>/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application #52283
  • Clarify Blazor Web Route behavior #52176
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #52352
  • chunkingcookiemanager leaks unused chunks #4639
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52446
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #52444
  • Perf regression: json, json #52445
  • False warning for attribute routes when using route tokens #52427
  • Expand event handling to BOM events #12798
    Planning: WebUI
  • Inheriting from InputText and adding "type" attribute results in nothing rendered #52450
  • My project whichi is working correctlly in visualstudio2022 v17.6 does not work after updating vs to v17.8 #52346
  • Blazor Server does not work after upgrade to .NET 8.0 #52095
  • Cannot render component from RazorClassLibrary with RenderMode.InteractiveWebAssembly or Auto in Blazor 8 #52037
  • .NET8 Not respecting @layout #52367
    Discussions
  • Blazor SSR rendering on navigation with JS interop/styling #52179
  • Blazor SSR error when rendermode is InteractiveWebAssembly #51749
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52418
  • Unable to call StaticWebAssetsLoader.UseStaticWebAssets after upgrading to VS 2022 official release #38212
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Fix generating enum schema in gRPC JSON transcoding OpenAPI #52449
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52443
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52442
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Fixed parsing string values into enum when provided string is not valid enum value #52402
    area-grpc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth, 9.0-preview1
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates #52428
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    area-infrastructure
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layouts block input even when they do not have a background (null background) #19124
    Backlog
  • Problem encountered on https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/maui/first-app-tutorial/create #19123
  • [Testing] SetSemantic tests fails on iOS 17 #19122
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Migration to .NET 8 breaks the Editor control in multiple ways #19121
  • [IOS] .NET 8.0 - Objective-C exception thrown. Name: CALayerInvalidGeometry #19120
    Backlog
  • VisualElement.RotateYTo is broken #19118
    Backlog
  • [Bug] .net8 Android not building because Resources from resx not found. #19117
  • Support the rest of the iOS Drag & Drop Delegates #19116
    Backlog
  • Buttons with DragGestureRecogniser doesn't fire default Command on Android #19111
    Backlog
  • The entry's cursor position is lost when transitioning to the next entry field on iOS only #19109
    Backlog
  • [testing] Enable WebView handler leak tests for iOS 14.5 and 15.4 #19107
    Backlog
  • Keyboard tabbing around a Modal Page cycles focus onto previous page. #19105
    Backlog
  • Cannot build iOS widget apps with extensions (ditto exited with code 1) #19104
  • CollectionView ItemTemplate dont respect the margin of the children items #19103
    Backlog
  • MAUI 8 `TapGestureRecognizer` no longer works on `Button` #19099
    Backlog
  • Shape's stroke is drawing only the external part, the inner part (within the shape area) is not drawing #19095
    Backlog
  • Markup Extension not working inside a ControlTemplate #19094

Closed

  • A button placed under another view cannot be tapped/clicked on iOS and MacCatalyst #15913
    Backlog
  • App crushes when native lib is called (C++ Shared Library project) #19119
    Backlog
  • Default font in WebView is wrong #19114
  • [Windows]Clicking on Snackbar should not open a new instance of the application #19003
  • Javax.Net.Ssl.SSLHandshakeException: #19092
  • TapGesture not working on image when NumberOfTapsRequired > 2 #19108
  • Deploying to iOS crashes with System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14011
  • The main branch is minimized before restoring the window, and the program crashes. #14053
    Backlog
  • Windows Titlebar where Close-Max-Min buttons rendered are different from where they are clickable #15297
  • Update manually Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility to 8 all icons disapper on windows #19096
  • iOS Background Task is not getting executed in every 15 min time #19063
  • CameraView in .net MAUI taking too much time for scanning barcode and QR code #19097

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added methods to set the device orientation from UITests #19100
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19093
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [tests] Ignore InputTransparencyGalleryTests matrix of UITests #19060
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Revert "[Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main)" #19079
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [tests] Ignore WebView leak test on old iOS #19076
    area/controls 🎮
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations bug when creating stored procedure with GOTO statement #32457
  • Add extension methods to turn relational nulls on/of for an individual LINQ query #32453
  • Computed column incorrectly created as nullable #32451

Closed

  • DBContext.Database.SqlQuery<string>(sql) get a wrong result #32435
  • Missing ConfigureAwait(false) for ToListAsync and related async terminating operators #32449
    9.0.0
  • Exception thrown when using IEnumberable<T>.First() inside of IEnumberable<T>.Contains() and IQueryable<T>.Where() #32442
  • Vulnerable package with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.0 #32441
  • Redundant JOIN in simple Where for one-to-many association #32419
  • [EF Core 6] EFCore.SqlServer uses EOL version of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #32395
  • Issues when using EF with tables that have PK Identity(int.MinValue, 1) with MS SQL #32391
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite how to prevent all the runtime binaries from being emitted? #32382
  • [EF Core 8] Many-to-many relationship with payload #32381
  • DbContext Scaffold : The specified deps.json does not exist #32358
  • One or more errors occurred. (Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #32318
  • EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.24 and 7.0.13 fails Scaffolding for data objects that have two primary keys as the Primary Clustered Key #32271
  • Migrations for default configurations are generated in wrong order #32264
  • SQL SERVER varchar(max) 字符串长度在 4000到8000之间，字符串内容包含中文。EF CORE 保存报错: 数据类型 0xA7 的数据长度或元数据长度无效 #32238
  • migrationBuilder.UpdateData() translates TimeOnly to wrong time in SQL (AM/PM Issue) #32229
  • Busting stale data in DB entities (L1 cache and other sheningans) #32438
  • Alias validation code throws false positive for subquery referenced multiple times in the tree #32455
  • Wrong conversion of List of Enum with explicit conversion #32447
  • My DTOs without DBSet declaration in DB Context class, are still generating separate tables. #32426
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #27844
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) on await foreach #32450
  • Switch to HashSet in LazyLoader #32445
  • Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32444
  • Fix to #27844 - EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #32398

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • Allow ignored key values for fixup before saving using TPT #32439
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Update CI to Latest OSes #17888
  • The Release Notes link is invalid on the .NET 9.0 SDK installation wizard. #17874

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes SDK diff after release of Aspire #17893
  • Do not reuse existing installation of .NET CLI in SB prep script #17892
  • Add Mariner cross-compile VMR builds #17891

Merged

  • Update to Fedora 39 #17840

Updated

  • Enable open ssl sha 1 signatures for CentOS Stream 9 #17889
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17882
